put.description: Updates an existing variable/secret with project-level default and optional environment-specific values

post.description: Adds a new variable/secret with project-level default and optional environment-specific values

400.description: Invalid request or variable already exists

get.description:
- **Description:** Retrieve a specific project type by its ID. 
- **Restrictions:** None. 
- **Permissions:** No specific permissions required. 
- **Audit Logging:** Not applicable.

put.description:
- **Description:** Updates details of a specified project type by its ID. 
- **Restrictions:** Only users with the correct permissions can update project types. 
- **Permissions:** Requires `PROJECT_TYPE_WRITE` permission. 
- **Audit Logging:** This operation is logged for audit purposes.

delete.description:
- **Description:** Deletes an existing project type based on its ID. 
- **Restrictions:** Only users with the correct RBAC permission can delete a project type. 
- **Permissions:** Requires `PROJECT_TYPE_DELETE` permission. 
- **Audit Logging:** This operation is logged for audit purposes.

get.description: Retrieve a specific label by its ID. Returns 404 if not found.

put.description: Update an existing label. Returns 404 if label not found, 400 if new name conflicts with another label.

delete.description: Delete a label by its ID. Returns 404 if label not found.

put.description: Updates resource files with mustache template content. Replaces .json files with .mustache files.

put.summary: Copy configurations from one cluster to another selectively
put.description: Copies configurations from the source cluster to the target cluster. When mode is INCLUDE: Only specified configuration types are copied. When mode is EXCLUDE: All configuration types are copied except the specified ones.

- **Description:** Detaches a rule and workflow from an artifact CI. 
- **Restrictions:** Existing CI registration required. 
- **Permissions:** Requires `ARTIFACT_CI_WRITE` permission. 
- **Audit Logging:** Not applicable.

- **Description:** Attaches a rule and workflow to an artifact CI. 
- **Restrictions:** CI must exist or will be created for the project. 
- **Permissions:** Requires `ARTIFACT_CI_WRITE` permission. 
- **Audit Logging:** Not applicable.

post.description: Adds multiple new variables/secrets with project-level defaults and optional environment-specific values

schema.description: List of variable requests with project defaults and environment values

400.description: Invalid request or variables already exist

get.description:
- **Description:** Retrieve a list of all existing project types. Supports filtering by legacy status and searching by name. 
- **Restrictions:** None. 
- **Permissions:** No specific permissions required. 
- **Audit Logging:** Not applicable.

post.description:
- **Description:** Creates a new project type from the provided request details. 
- **Restrictions:** Only users with the appropriate permissions can add project types. 
- **Permissions:** Requires `PROJECT_TYPE_WRITE` permission. 
- **Audit Logging:** This operation is logged for audit purposes.

- **Description:** Marks a specific module version as published.
- **Permissions:** Requires MODULE_WRITE permission. 
- **Audit Logging:** Yes

- **Description:** Uploads a module using a file.
- **Permissions:** Requires MODULE_WRITE permission.
- **Parameters:**
  - `file`: The module file to upload
  - `metadata` (optional): Additional module metadata including:
    - `gitUrl`: Web URL of the git repository (Expected to embed the commit id)
    - `gitRef`: Git reference (branch, tag, or commit)
    - `isFeatureBranch`: If this is true, this preview module cannot be directly marked as published until we register the module again with this as false.
- **Audit Logging:** Yes

- **Description:** Marks a specific module version as published.
- **Permissions:** Requires MODULE_WRITE permission. 
- **Audit Logging:** Yes

- **Description:** Bootstraps modules for initialization.
- **Audit Logging:** No specific audit logging at the moment.

get.description: Retrieve all labels from the system

post.description: Create a new label with the specified name and color code. Returns 400 if a label with the same name already exists.

parameters.name: releaseTraceId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the release that you can search it with

post.summary: Send a message to a chat

post.description:
- **Description:** Saves CI/CD configuration details. 
- **Restrictions:** Cannot change registration type after initial configuration. 
- **Permissions:** Requires `CI_CD_CONFIGURE` permission. 
- **Audit Logging:** This operation is logged for audit purposes.

- **Description:** Registers a new artifact within the system for SaaS. 
- **Restrictions:** Valid artifactory name and consistent registration type required. Blueprint must be CI/CD configured. 
- **Permissions:** Requires `ARTIFACTS_WRITE` permission. 
- **Audit Logging:** Not applicable.

- **Description:** Generates push credentials for an artifact. 
- **Restrictions:** Only for supported artifactory types. 
- **Permissions:** Requires `ARTIFACTS_WRITE` permission. 
- **Audit Logging:** Not applicable.

post.summary: Create a new Environment for a blueprint

post.description:
- **Description:** Create and run Action Runs for multiple Actions with individual parameters. 
- **Restrictions:** None. 
- **Permissions:** Requires `RUN_ACTION` permission. 
- **Audit Logging:** Not applicable.

delete.summary: Delete a TF output by name and namespace
delete.description: Deletes a TF output. By default, deletion is blocked if the output is in use by any modules or intents. Use force=true to override this validation and delete anyway.

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Force deletion even if output is in use. Default: false. When false, deletion fails with 400 error if output is referenced by modules/intents.

get.summary: Get all outputs that use a specific provider source

get.description: Retrieves values of a specific variable/secret across all environments in a project
Use this to sync stack with git. Runs synchronously for the stack, and then does a non-force sync of all clusters in async

- **Description:** Retrieves all modules with optional filtering.
- **Parameters:**
  - `canDownload` (optional): When true, returns only modules that have downloadable content (modules with path). Defaults to false.
- **Permissions:** Requires MODULE_READ permission.
- **Audit Logging:** No specific audit logging at the moment.

- **Description:** Retrieves all add-on modules based on stack, intent and flavor, optionally by cloud.
- **Audit Logging:** No specific audit logging at the moment.

- **Description:** Retrieves a module by its ID.
- **Audit Logging:** No specific audit logging at the moment.

delete.description:
- **Description:** Deletes a module by ID.
- **Permissions:** Requires MODULE_DELETE permission. 
- **Audit Logging:** Yes

get.description:
- **Description:** Retrieves all usages of a module across stacks and clusters.
- **Audit Logging:** No specific audit logging at the moment.

- **Description:** Retrieves grouped modules specifically for a stack name.
- **Audit Logging:** No specific audit logging at the moment.

- **Description:** Retrieves all modules with optional filtering.
- **Audit Logging:** No specific audit logging at the moment.

get.summary: Get add ons for this resource
Get autocomplete data with module-specific output trees
get.description: Returns module-specific output trees for each resource with automatic fallback to intent-level outputs

- **Description:** Retrieves CI/CD details for a specified project name. 
- **Restrictions:** Requires existing default artifact routing rule or promotion workflow. 
- **Permissions:** None required. 
- **Audit Logging:** Not applicable.

- **Description:** Retrieve Actions optionally filtered by cluster, resource type, and resource name. 
- **Restrictions:** Actions are filtered based on provided parameters. 
- **Permissions:** None required. 
- **Audit Logging:** Not applicable.

- **Description:** Retrieve Action Runs for a specific Action. 
- **Restrictions:** None. 
- **Permissions:** None required. 
- **Audit Logging:** Not applicable.

- **Description:** Download the file uploaded for a specific Action Run. 
- **Restrictions:** User must have access to the associated task. 
- **Permissions:** Requires task access permissions. 
- **Audit Logging:** Not applicable.

- **Description:** Retrieve logs for a specific step of an Action Run. 
- **Restrictions:** None. 
- **Permissions:** None required. 
- **Audit Logging:** Not applicable.

id.description: Unique identifier for the web component

name.description: Unique identifier for the web component

type.description: Type of web component (NAV_TYPE or TAB_TYPE)

remoteURL.description: Hosted location of the component script

iconURL.description: URL of the icon to be displayed in the UI

tooltip.description: Tooltip text to display on hover

additionalProperties.description: Additional contextual attributes for component configuration

contextualAttributes.description: Additional contextual attributes for component configuration

WebComponentDTO.description: Model representing a Web Component for embedding custom applications

global.description: Whether this is a global variable

VariableRequest.description: Variable request with project default and environment values

description.example: This is a sample project type

iacTool.description: IAC tool used for the project

legacy.description: Whether this is a legacy project type

accountId.description: Account ID associated with the Git repository

TemplateGitDetails.description: Git details for the template used in Project Type

colorCode.description: Color code for the label in hex format

LabelRequest.description: Label request with label name and optional color code

labelIds.description: List of label IDs to assign to the deployment. Replaces existing labels. Use empty list to clear all labels. Labels must be created beforehand using label management APIs.

items.description: List of label IDs to assign to the deployment. Replaces existing labels. Use empty list to clear all labels. Labels must be created beforehand using label management APIs.

CopyConfigurationsRequest.description: Request containing source cluster ID, selection mode (INCLUDE/EXCLUDE), and set of configuration types

ciName.description: CI name to which the operation is applied.

blueprintName.description: Blueprint name related to the CI.

AttachDetachCiRequest.description: Request details for attaching or detaching a rule and workflow to/from a CI.

nameRegex.description: Regular expression pattern for validating resource names

enableKubernetesExplorer.description: Whether Kubernetes Explorer should be enabled for this resource

gitRef.description: Reference to a specific GIT branch or commit

clouds.description: Supported cloud providers for this module

items.description: Supported cloud providers for this module

stage.description: Stage of the TF Module in its lifecycle

allowedTestProjects.description: List of test projects where this module will be available. If absent, it is available globally.

items.description: List of test projects where this module will be available. If absent, it is available globally.

nameLengthLimit.description: Maximum allowed length for resource names using this module

registrationType.description: Registration type for the CI/CD setup.

mapToAllCis.description: Indicate whether to map to all CI systems.

applicationName.description: Application name associated with the request.

stringVal.description: String value for string type parameters. Only used when type is 'string'
